TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWorkflowDebugger

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 定義介面，這個介面會從工作流程主應用程式 (Host Application) 內執行的 物件接收工作流程執行個體的建立、執行和終止狀態資訊。

span.span: Defines the interface that receives workflow instance creation, execution, and termination status information from a object running inside the workflow host application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 此介面是由偵錯工具裝載的 .NET 遠端物件實作。This interface is implemented by a .NET remoting object hosted by the debugger.

param.name: assemblyFullName
param.span: ，其中包含載入工作流程類型所在的組件名稱。

span.span: A containing the assembly name from which the workflow type was loaded.

param.name: fileName
param.span: ，其中包含對應工作流程之標記檔案的完整路徑，如果工作流程類型是僅限程式碼的工作流程則為 。

span.span: A containing the full path of the markup file corresponding to the workflow, or if the workflow type was a code-only workflow.

param.name: md5Digest
param.span: ，其中包含工作流程標記定義的 md5 雜湊程式碼，如果工作流程類型是僅限程式碼的工作流程則為 。

span.span: A containing the md5 hash code for the workflow markup definition, or if the workflow type was a code-only workflow.

param.name: isDynamic
param.span: 指示是否動態修改工作流程定義的 。

span.span: A that indicates whether the workflow definition was modified dynamically.

param.name: scheduleNamespace
param.span: 包含工作流程類型之完整名稱的 。

span.span: A containing the fully qualified name of the workflow type.

param.name: scheduleName
param.span: 包含工作流程類型名稱的 。

span.span: A containing the workflow type name.

param.name: workflowMarkup
param.span: ，其中包含工作流程類型的 XAML 序列化格式。

span.span: A containing the XAML serialized format of the workflow type.

summary.span: 在工作流程主應用程式中的工作流程執行階段引擎載入新的工作流程類型時呼叫。

span.span: Called when a new workflow type is loaded by the workflow runtime engine in the workflow host application.

span.span: Called to set the initial status of the activities in a workflow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從持續性存放區載入工作流程執行個體，或偵錯工具附加到擁有執行中工作流程執行個體的工作流程主機時，會呼叫此方法。This method is called when a workflow instance is loaded from a persistence store or when the debugger is attached to a workflow host that has workflow instance already running.
